The tuple/remove.hpp header defines macros to remove an element from an array.

Usage

#include <boost/preprocessor/tuple/remove.hpp>

Contents

  • BOOST_PP_TUPLE_REMOVE (v)
  • BOOST_PP_TUPLE_REMOVE_D (v)
